```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(fixest)
library(stargazer)

df <- read.csv("../data/q2.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
df0 <- filter(df, time == 0)
income <- feols(income_pc ~ cash, data = df0, cluster = ~village_code)
elder <- feols(elder ~ cash, data = df0, cluster = ~village_code)
summary(income)
summary(elder)
```
